name: Dystal
description:
story

The time when humans lost their dreams Even when he was sleeping, he couldn't satisfy his dreams. Even if I make a dream

The man who lost that dream Began to appreciate his greed and began to experiment with dreams with various creatures for people to find the meaning of life.

Even greed is too hard to control. Some organizations have begun to lead their human beings to experiment to create dreams. but did not succeed because of that dream

There is too much complexity in the human nervous system. therefore searching for what is like an inducer of the pure mind of a living being

For example, a cat was brought to the experiment. Man is too hard to fathom his own needs and desires. So I did some experiments.

With so many cats, it's easy to get into your cat's dream to comfort yourself. But that greed didn't end until humans started stealing their dreams.

The cat, who has adjusted to his thoughts, has started to resist and wants to escape humans from the dream world.

KeyBoard

A  = Move left

D = Move Right

SpaceBar = Jump

Mechanic

Flower = Healing

Ice Spike = Damage

Water Acid = Damage Overtime

BlackHole = Win
